description:
The jig is up - Kanata saw Rio coming out of the distillery, and now she won`t rest until she knows what`s going on! Filicia proposes a little game, and if Kanata wins, they`ll tell her everything. But of course, Filicia still has an ace up her sleeve...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bangai Hen, Dai 7.5 Wa: Kyouen - Toride no Sensou
番外編 第7.5話「饗宴・砦ノ戦争」
